articles.description: Benfica claim there is a "defamation campaign" against Gianluca Prestianni after Uefa launched an investigation into claims he racially abused Real Madrid winger Vinicius Jr.
articles.title: Vinicius Junior: Benfica claim 'defamation campaign' against Gianluca Prestianni after racism allegation

articles.description: Follow build-up before live text and radio commentary as Newcastle visit Qarabag in the first leg of their Champions League play-off.
articles.title: Qarabağ vs Newcastle United: Champions League play-off first leg

articles.description: Rebecca Morrison executes a sensational double takeout with her final stone as Team GB steal two in the final end to beat the United States 8-7.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Team GB's curling semi-final hopes alive after sensational win over US

articles.description: Muddled selection and the lack of a plan B - how Australia's T20 World Cup campaign was derailed in Sri Lanka.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: 'Australia's muddled thinking behind early exit'

articles.description: American star Mikaela Shiffrin cemented her status as the greatest alpine skier of all time as she won Olympic slalom gold in emphatic fashion.
articles.title: Mikaela Shiffrin breezes to Winter Olympic slalom gold in emphatic fashion

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he finds the new Formula 1 cars this year "more fun" to drive - in contrast to the views of Max Verstappen and Fernando Alonso.
articles.title: F1 pre-season testing: Lewis Hamilton says new cars are more fun

articles.description: Opener Sahibzada Farhan hits a sparkling 58-ball century as Pakistan cruise into the Super 8s at the T20 World Cup.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Pakistan reach Super 8s by beating Namibia

articles.description: You do not need to look far to find people proclaiming that VAR works fine outside the Premier League. BBC Sport spoke to people across Europe's top leagues to find out.
articles.title: Is VAR just as controversial in the rest of Europe's top leagues?

articles.description: Eddie Howe has called on his Newcastle players to continue to "step up" in Bruno Guimaraes' absence - is this Jacob Ramsey's time to shine?
articles.title: Jacob Ramsey: Has Bruno Guimaraes given midfielder time to shine?

articles.description: Ukraine officials will "not be present at the opening ceremony" or "take part in any other official Paralympic events" at next month's Winter Games following the inclusion of Russia and Belarus.
articles.title: Winter Paralympics 2026: Ukraine officials to boycott Games after Russia and Belarus inclusion
